title.rendered: Investors of these NFTs can even win a trip to space: An exclusive metaverse club

content.rendered:
Wealthy Teds are a collection of NFTs coming out soon. Its particularity does not lie in the shape of a teddy bear that they have, which could be… but in that works like a private club in which its members continue to educate themselves in the field of investments in digital assets to maximize their profits and, in addition, they can access exclusive rewards such as a Rolls Royce, VIP tickets to sporting events or even a trip to space.

In this context are born Wealthy Ted’s, a collection that will have a total of 10,200 teddy bear-shaped NFTs and will be released at the end of next April. As we said: The peculiarity of them is that the investors become part of an exclusive club by acquiring them that gives them access to opportunities practically unattainable by other means.

Gold and silver bars, luxury watches, private jet travelstays on yachts along the most exclusive coasts in the world, stays in exclusive hotels, VIP access to events such as Formula 1 or Moto GP races, a Bored Ape NFT, a Rolls Royce and even a trip to space.

Wealthy Teds will literally take their members to the moon. This NFT company has reached a collaboration agreement with one of the first companies on the planet that will operate trips to space. The experience will include transportation by private plane to Dubai, from where the flight begins in a capsule propelled by a balloon at an altitude of up to 40 kilometers. The lucky passengers will be able to see the darkness of space and the curvature of the earth as well as enjoy a space gastronomic experience prepared by a Michelin Star.

This private club also functions as access to very valuable knowledge within the world of investments in digital assets and to a privileged network of leading personalities in the sector, as well as continuous training to promote investors to increase their assets as much as possible through groups. Discord privates and secret events. Thus becoming an asset that has guaranteed profitability from day one.
